Object Parameters: Time until the bridge goes up (and animation starts playing)
Animation / Bridge opening speed (0x3 normal, 0x1 faster, 0x10 slow)
Description:
Bridge from Delfino Pier. Slot [[Slot#battle1.2|A1.2]] enables its SFX (includes a bell sound).
Animation capped at 30 frames. S3 might be a relic of old animation length.
